rules.name: Yes_Pardot_Score_50_Greater
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7))
rules.label: Yes - Score Greater than 400

rules.name: Yes_First_Lead_Owner
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR 9) AND (8 OR (10 AND 11)) AND 12
rules.label: Yes - First Lead Owner

rules.name: Yes_Fields_populated

Flow.description: BODEV-4481 Additional revenue fields on the Lead and Account objects Updated to flow to calculate the Revenue Range

formulas.name: ClearbitEmployees
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} <= 30, "Micro", IF({!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} < 250, "SMB", IF({!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} >= 250 && {!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} <= 999, "MM - Small", IF({!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} >= 1000 && {!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} <= 2499, "MM - Large", IF({!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} >= 2500 && {!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} <= 14999, "Enterprise", IF({!$Record.cbit_Employees__c} >= 15000 , "Strategic", NULL))))) )

formulas.name: MarketingSourceNew
formulas.expression:
/* Map the marketing source based on Marketing Channel (FT) on leads */
Case({!$Record.bizible2__Marketing_Channel_FT__c}, "Paid Search", "Paid Search", "Direct", "Direct", "Email", "Direct", "3rd Party Review", "Review Sites", "Social", "Social Organic", "Paid Social", "Paid Social", "Paid Referral", "Paid Referral", "Organic Search", {!Organic_ReviewSitesSource}, "Web Referral", {!Organic_ReviewSitesSource}, "Partnerships", {!Organic_ReviewSitesSource}, "Other", {!Organic_ReviewSitesSource}, TEXT({!$Record.Marketing_Source__c}) )

formulas.name: MktSourceDetailed_ReviewSites
Organic_ReviewSitesSource
formulas.expression: /* Map the marketing source based on touch point source in leads */ IF(CONTAINS({!$Record.bizible2__Touchpoint_Source_FT__c},"G2") || CONTAINS({!$Record.bizible2__Touchpoint_Source_FT__c},"DPM") || CONTAINS({!$Record.bizible2__Touchpoint_Source_FT__c},"Crozdesk"), "Review Sites", "Organic" )

Flow.label: Lead [BSF] Handler
